TheBrenton

Appreciate the link, but unfortunately that is the DVD unrated version... Trying to find a Bluray Unrated version of ultraviolet that isn't "japanese" only or what have you is the issue. Actually there isn't anything OTHER than the DVD version of the unrated one on amazon. This covers numerous other retailers. I've tried.. When i initially went to make my purchase it was one of the things i was most unhappy about, i was forced to purchase the rated version which is just terrible in comparison.
Excellent movie and good quality! Best you'll find of this movie in such a small size! Thanks uploader will continue to seed!
